chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 is experiencing the following issue:
Visible scratches on the camera lens at a distance of more than 20cm that do not match a product in perfect condition.

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we do not have any available stocks for replacement. Instead, we have refunded the customer.

Regards,
AS
